\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 56250}

\subsection*{Bored Teenagers}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Justin S}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 2000 mg & oral & Pharms - Metaxalone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 148.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Recently a friend of mine found a full bottle of about 50 400mg tablets of Skelaxin in the back of his medicine cabinet. My friend was going to smoke a bowl of pot, but I am currently undergoing weekly drug tests, so I decided to try the Skelaxin.



The bottle said to take 2 tablets 3 times a day, so I took 5 with a glass of water (3:30pm). By 3:45pm, I was starting to feel a \emph{little} different, but not that different. I had noticed that my feet, my ass and hands had all fallen `asleep', (tingly), and that I was experiencing a really euphoric body buzz.



By around 5:00pm, I had noticed that the effects of the pills were gone. Needless to say, tommorow I am going to go get the rest of that bottle.

\end{document}
